casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Raymond GRIFFIN 322P15-8 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Mr. Raymond Alan Griffin, For Griffin, Raymond Alan Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of March 2018 by Defendant for Appeal of Motion for Appropriate Relief by Certiorari:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
